citations.desc: Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control.
citations.narrative:
There is excessive excreta and food waste on the blankets and flooring in the two capuchin enclosures. The enclosures
are said to have been cleaned two days ago. All enclosures shall be spot cleaned daily to prevent such accumulations
and allow the non human primates to move about their enclosures without becoming soiled by the waste, minimize odors
and decrease the risk of disease hazard.
Correct by October 7, 2021.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee.
End Section

narrative:
3.84(a) 
   
Cleaning, sanitization, housekeeping, and pest control. 
There is excessive excreta and food waste on the blankets and flooring in the two capuchin enclosures.  The enclosures 
are said to have been cleaned two days ago.  All enclosures shall be spot cleaned daily to prevent such accumulations 
and allow the non human primates to move about their enclosures without becoming soiled by the waste, minimize odors 
and decrease the risk of disease hazard. 
Correct by October 7, 2021. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the Licensee. 
 
End Section
